isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - REMOTE PTO SPEED CONTROL (RPTO) - TROUBLESHOOTING

svcproc.title: TROUBLESHOOTING
svcproc.para: The EST can be used to monitor the status of the PTO controls. Comparing the data list reading to actual operation will indicate if the controls are operating properly. Using the menu of programmable parameters, the ECM programming can also be verified to insure that the ECM is properly programmed for PTO applications.

Refer to circuit diagram for troubleshooting ( Figure 3.87
).
